inventory_types.description: Determines whether to check for items in the entity's inventory, inventories of powers present in the entity, or both.
inventory_types.markdownDescription: Determines whether to check for items in the entity's inventory, inventories of powers present in the entity, or both.

process_mode.description: Determines how the item stacks in the specified inventory/inventories are evaluated.
process_mode.markdownDescription: Determines how the item stacks in the specified inventory/inventories are evaluated.

item_condition.description: If specified, only account for items from the specified inventory/inventories that fulfill this condition.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only account for items from the specified inventory/inventories that fulfill this condition.

slots.description: If specified, only items from these specified item slots are evaluated.
slots.markdownDescription: If specified, only items from these specified item slots are evaluated.

slot.description: If specified, only the item from this specified item slot is evaluated.
slot.markdownDescription: If specified, only the item from this specified item slot is evaluated.

power.description: If specified and if `inventory_type` is `"power"`, the items in the inventory of this power will be evaluated instead.
power.markdownDescription: If specified and if `inventory_type` is `"power"`, the items in the inventory of this power will be evaluated instead.

comparison.description: Determines how the amount of items/stacks that were evaluated are compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the amount of items/stacks that were evaluated are compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the amount of items/stacks that were evaluated are compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the amount of items/stacks that were evaluated are compared to.

type.description:
## Inventory --- Entity Condition Type Checks if the inventory of the entity is occupied. Type ID: `origins:inventory` --- ### Examples ```json "condition": { "type": "origins:inventory", "process_mode": "stacks", "comparison": ">=", "compare_to": 10 } ``` This example will check if 10 or more slots are occupied by any items in the entity's inventory.
```json "condition": { "type": "origins:inventory", "process_mode": "items", "item_condition": { "type": "origins:ingredient", "ingredient": { "tag": "minecraft:flowers" } }, "comparison": "<", "compare_to": 16 } ``` This example will check if 15 or less individual items that are included in the `#minecraft:flowers` (`data/minecraft/tags/items/flowers.json`) item tag are in the inventory of the entity.
type.markdownDescription:
undefined## Inventory --- Entity Condition Type Checks if the inventory of the entity is occupied. Type ID: `origins:inventory` --- ### Examples ```json "condition": { "type": "origins:inventory", "process_mode": "stacks", "comparison": ">=", "compare_to": 10 } ``` This example will check if 10 or more slots are occupied by any items in the entity's inventory.
```json "condition": { "type": "origins:inventory", "process_mode": "items", "item_condition": { "type": "origins:ingredient", "ingredient": { "tag": "minecraft:flowers" } }, "comparison": "<", "compare_to": 16 } ``` This example will check if 15 or less individual items that are included in the `#minecraft:flowers` (`data/minecraft/tags/items/flowers.json`) item tag are in the inventory of the entity.
